title: EXT_mesh_features glTF extension
description: glTF extension that assigns metadata to features in a model.

schema.description: An object defining classes and enums.

schemaUri.description: A uri to an external schema file.

propertyTables.description: A dictionary, where each key is a property table ID and each value is an object defining the property table.

propertyTextures.description: A dictionary, where each key is a property texture ID and each value is an object defining the property texture.
